answers.answer: Unless there's complications you should get your first rh shot at 28weeks and thananother one shortly after your baby is born
Yes 28 weeks, I also have to get it.
If you have any bleeding then you will get the shot. You will also get one at 28 weeks and after baby is born.
I just got my shot at 29 weeks. But thats because of transportation issues  but u need it again after baby is born
Okay thanks! So I should get at my next appointment, I will be 28 weeks, but would they give it to me because I have the gestational diabetes test the same day
I got mine at 10 weeks from the hospital because I was spotting. Then I got one at 33 weeks and the next one I get will be when I deliver they will apply fluids into my ivy as I'm in labor.

question: When would I get the shot to being Rh negative? How many times do I have to get it? Also about Iron shots?
